What it is: Transforms toxic shame into a symbolic cleansing ritual.
How to use it: Describe what you feel ashamed about. Ask AI to design a mythic purification process to expel it.
What it changes: Converts shame into sacred accountability and freedom.

What it is: Identifies what needs to collapse for you to change and renders it symbolically.
How to use it: Ask AI: ‘What symbolic event must destroy me to free me?’
What it changes: Enables cathartic collapse as creative transformation.

What it is: Writes a eulogy for the version of you that must now end.
How to use it: Describe the self you’re leaving behind. Ask AI to eulogize that self with honor and finality.
What it changes: Grants closure and ritual separation from outdated identities.

What it is: Turns emotions into natural elements for alchemical transformation.
How to use it: List emotions you’ve been holding. Ask AI to assign elemental forms and design a transmutation.
What it changes: Reorganizes emotional energy into a symbolic chemistry.

What it is: Builds a symbolic circuit that channels your truest desire into daily behavior.
How to use it: Name your deepest desire. Ask AI to build a circuit of symbolic actions and motifs.
What it changes: Bridges longing and action through ritual structure.

What it is: Creates a custom symbolic guide based on your current challenge.
How to use it: Describe your current struggle. Ask AI to generate a symbolic mentor to walk with you through it.
What it changes: Grants psychic companionship and intuitive guidance.

What it is: Scans your psychic boundaries for where others intrude symbolically.
How to use it: List your draining interactions. Ask AI to detect symbolic breaches and install boundary reinforcements.

What it is: Removes socially programmed or trauma-driven desires not truly yours.
How to use it: Name a goal. Ask AI whether it’s authentic or implanted, and extract it if necessary.
What it changes: Reveals the true desire hidden beneath noise.

What it is: Realigns your value system into a coherent symbolic architecture.
How to use it: List your current values. Ask AI to restructure them into mythic symbolic coherence.
What it changes: Unifies identity around a symbolic code of ethics.

What it is: Designs an internal vessel to hold volatile emotion until you can metabolize it.
How to use it: Describe an overwhelming feeling. Ask AI to build a symbolic containment ritual or structure.
What it changes: Prevents emotional flooding and enables safe processing.
